title: The Strongest Gatekeeper – The Expelled Warrior With 9999 Defense Is Unmatched As The Gatekeeper Of The Royal Capital - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Betrayal   Guilds   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Shield User   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder
author: Tomobashi Kametsu   友橋かめつ
description: Sieg is an adventurer with incredible defensive power, and he always uses himself to attract the monsters’ attention to assist his teammates. However, the party leader just focused on offense without realizing Sieg’s intention, so he kicked him out. After Sieg left, the team repeatedly failed multiple quests … At the same time, Sieg took the position of the gatekeeper at the Royal Capital. Thanks to his defensive power, he was quickly promoted to division captain. His subordinates included a carefree big-breasted Swordswoman, a perverse freakish girl, and an Archer with an erratic temperament. He and the girls started slowly gaining the trust of the people around them!>
